item.title: IFF writes to Google India about recent instances of YouTube copyright strikes
item.description: We write to Google India highlighting that action taken upon copyright complaints is based on an incorrect application of copyright law and YouTubeâ€™s policies and, therefore, threatens press freedom and is in violation of the constitutional rights of digital media reporters and its audience.
